paper_keywords: interval-valued T-fuzzy (implicative positive implicative MV regular) filters
paper_abstract: The aim of this paper is further to develop the fuzzy filter theory and fuzzy congruence relation on a residuated lattice. First, we introduce the concepts of interval-valued T-fuzzy (implicative, positive implicative, MV, regular) filters with respect to a t-norm T on D[0, 1] and investigate their properties, and some equivalent characterizations of these generalized fuzzy filters are derived. Next, we introduce the concept of interval-valued T-fuzzy congruence relation on a residuated lattice, and the relation between interval-valued T-fuzzy congruences and interval-valued T-fuzzy filters are investigated. Finally, we construct a new residuated lattice which induced by interval-valued T -fuzzy congruences, the homomorphism theorem is given.
paper_title: Interval-valued T-fuzzy filters and interval-valued T-fuzzy congruences on residuated lattices
